<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Golden Breath Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2036)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 8,100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You take damage.

 
</row>

</column>

---

An enterprising chirurgeon reversed the forces evoked by a [_void thousand-pains fulu_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2044) to create the _golden breath fulu_, which fortifies qi and the body as elements move out of balance. When you Activate this fulu, you regain 75 Hit Points and attempt a [flat check](/Rules.aspx?ID=333) to end any [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=86) affecting you. The fulu is particularly appropriate help for ending any persistent damage. Also, if you would regain more Hit Points from the fulu than your maximum, you can gain the excess as [temporary Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2321) or distribute the excess among creatures of your choice within 30 feet. The temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
